assignment.pkg4

Class Pile

  • java.lang.Object
    • assignment.pkg4.Pile

  • public class Pile
extends java.lang.Object
    A Pile object. - Created with a random amount of marbles between 20-95 - Knows its size. - Knows if its empty or not. - Can have marbles removed by a player.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Pile()
      Create the Pile of marbles object with a random number of marbles anywhere from 20-95

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getSize()
      getSize is used to get the number of marbles left in the pile.
      boolean isEmpty()
      isEmpty is used to determine if there are any marbles left in the pile.
      void removeMarbles(int amountToRemove)
      removeMarbles is the method called to remove a number of marbles from the pile equal to the number specified by the user

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Pile

        public Pile()
        Create the Pile of marbles object with a random number of marbles anywhere from 20-95

    • Method Detail

      • getSize

        public int getSize()
        getSize is used to get the number of marbles left in the pile.
        Returns:
        this will return the amount of marbles left in the pile.

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        isEmpty is used to determine if there are any marbles left in the pile.
        Returns:
        this will return true if the pile is empty, and false if the pile is not empty

      • removeMarbles

        public void removeMarbles(int amountToRemove)
        removeMarbles is the method called to remove a number of marbles from the pile equal to the number specified by the user
        Parameters:
        amountToRemove - the number of marbles to remove from the pile specified by the user or computer
